summary: Adds a small, basic campsite with 4 non-respawning containers to the West of Riverwood/
descriptionHtml: My first mod. Adds a small campsite to the West of Riverwood across the river which can be used as a starter home after slaying the hostile NPC there. The campsite has 4 containers (non-respawning so safe for storage) a cooking pot as well as a few other items and some gold. Any feedback, suggestions and bug reports would be greatly appreciated. Thanks :)
author: Hexarchy
